item.title: First Entry in my new Gemini Log
item.description: The first entry of my Gemini Log (Gemlog) is up: 2023-03-17 - Hello, Universe! I am thinking that my Gemini Capsule should be a place for me to share my writing, my writerâ€™s journal, and my musings about writing.
